# Pull Request

## TL;DR

- One-line impact statement.

## Summary

- What changed and why.

## Changes

- Key change 1.
- Key change 2.

## Screenshots or Video (UI only)

- N/A or attach visuals.

## Risk and Rollback

- Risk level: Low / Medium / High.
- Rollback: How to revert or disable if needed.

## Testing

- [ ] Not run (explain why)
- [ ] Manual testing (steps)
- [ ] Automated tests (commands)

## Checklist

- [ ] Scope is small and focused
